Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of The Human Meteor and Initial Conflicts
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the protagonist, Duke O'Dowd as The Human Meteor, and sets up initial conflicts including a taxi fare, a pursuit, an ambush, and his transformation and initial heroic actions.

sub_scenes.title: Cover Introduction and Taxi Dispatch
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the comic book cover's introduction of the hero and the start of Duke's day as a taxi driver, leading to his first fare.

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit and Transformation at the Pier
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Duke's taxi ride, the suspicious pursuit by G-Man Holden, the ambush at the pier, and Duke's transformation into The Human Meteor.

narrative_arcs.title: Pursuit and Ambush at the Pier

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's First Actions and Hospital Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Human Meteor confronting the attackers, interacting with the police, recovering in the hospital, and receiving a new mission briefing.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration Plan and Stowaway
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Duke planning to infiltrate the yacht and his attempt to stow away, which is quickly discovered.

sub_scenes.title: Toby's Undercover Mission and Submarine Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene reveals Toby's undercover operation on the yacht, his discovery of the submarine, and the true nature of his mission.

narrative_arcs.title: Return, Submarine Discovery, and Mission Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Submarine Attack and Yacht Divers
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Human Meteor's dive to the submarine, the arrival of allied divers from the yacht, and the enemy's activities around the submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Combat and Escape
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the underwater combat between Human Meteor, allied divers, and enemy divers, including escape attempts and environmental hazards.

sub_scenes.title: Torpedo Attack and Shipboard Concerns
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers Human Meteor's torpedo attack on the submarine, concerns about Peter on the ship, and the ship's reaction to the geyser caused by the explosion.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Depth Map Discovery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Human Meteor boarding the yacht, finding Peter, searching for the depth map, and informing the Navy.

narrative_arcs.title: Informing the Navy about Peter's Map

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Domestic Scene
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Human Meteor storyline with a speedboat journey, hospital visit to Holden, and a domestic scene with Toby at bedtime.

narrative_arcs.title: Evening Drive and Bedtime for Toby

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Fiends and Ambulance Emergency
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Liberty Lads fighting Nazi fiends and transitions to a separate scene involving an ambulance and two boys who discover a wallet clue.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Combat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the Liberty Lads in a firefight against Nazi fiends, highlighting the action and ideological conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Wallet Clue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on two boys observing an ambulance arrival, the concern for an injured person, and the discovery of a wallet leading to a new clue.

narrative_arcs.title: Wallet Discovery and Bus Garage Clue

sub_scenes.title: Bus Garage Mystery and Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the boys' arrival at the bus garage, witnessing a marine saluting a civilian, and their encounter with Mr. Horst, leading to a threatening situation.

narrative_arcs.title: Chasing the Bus for Wallet Return
Waiting on the Bench and Approaching Threat

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation, Violent Plan, and Bronson's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Mr. Horst's interrogation of the boys, the revelation of a violent plan against them, and Major Bronson's sudden intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Chaos and Bronson's Lethal Turn
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the eruption of chaos, the boys' capture, Horst's threat, and Major Bronson's sudden violent action against Horst's men.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Melee and Call to Stop

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks Attack and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene covers the boys seeking help, the attack on the Marine Barracks, Skip's defense, the Nazi confrontation with Bronson, and the final intervention and resolution by the Marines.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Marine Help at the Waterfront
Discovery and Confrontation in the Secret Office
Resolution and Congratulations for Stopping Nazi Spies

Major_Arcs.title: Champ and Henry in South American Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Champ and Henry embroiled in intrigue in South America, investigating the kidnapping of Rosita and confronting El Tigre and Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to South American Intrigue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Champ and Henry in a desert conflict and transitions to a South American town, setting the stage for intrigue.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Champ and Henry in Intrigue

sub_scenes.title: Officers' Suspicious Actions and Expulsion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the suspicious actions of officers, including arrests, questioning, and expulsions, setting a tense atmosphere in the town.

sub_scenes.title: Consul Visit and Rosita Kidnapping Explanation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows Champ and Henry being escorted to the American Consul and receiving an explanation about Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre.

narrative_arcs.title: Escort to Consul and Investigation Inquiry
Explanation of Rosita's Kidnapping and Suspicion

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Capture and Misdirection
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Champ and Henry being captured by El Tigre and taken to a house, where they encounter 'Mama' and a seeming misdirection.

sub_scenes.title: Plan to Infiltrate El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the planning and initial infiltration of El Tigre's hideout to rescue Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning the Approach to El Tigre
Approaching Guards and Confrontation with El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Rosita's Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the interrogation of a captured man, the search for Rosita, and the eventual discovery and rescue of Rosita from Axis agents.

narrative_arcs.title: Interrogation and Twist Regarding Axis Agents
Misunderstanding and Clarification about El Tigre
Rosita's Location Revealed and Rescue Mission Initiated

sub_scenes.title: Combat and Resolution of Rosita's Kidnapping
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Rosita kidnapping storyline with close combat, the arrival of government forces, and the resolution of the Nazi spy plot, ending with a celebratory tone.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival of Government Forces and Manhunt

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in Jungle Spy Ring
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, fighting against a spy ring, facing accusations of disobeying orders, and ultimately being trusted and sent on a new mission.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Military Briefing
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Devil Dog Dolan fighting in the jungle and transitions to a military briefing discussing his actions and potential insubordination.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Combat and Introduction of Devil Dog Dolan
Reassurance and Trust in Dolan's Intentions

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Infiltration and Native Ambush
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dolan arriving in the jungle, observing, sensing danger, and a separate character being ambushed and captured by natives.

sub_scenes.title: Torture and Plan Extraction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the captured soldier being brought before Grauer, suspicion among soldiers about Dolan, orders for interrogation, and the actual torture and extraction of plans.

sub_scenes.title: Arson, Marine Attack, and Grauer's Orders
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts arson, a marine attack, Sam's justification, Grauer's orders, and the destructive consequences of the fire.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine's Attack and Attempt to Stop Him
Burning Native Huts and Flames' Surge
Arsonist's Gloating and Reassurance to Sam

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Native Encounter and Pursuit of Grauer
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Devil Dog Dolan's surprise attack on natives, the chief's accidental death, the natives' homage to Dolan, and the subsequent pursuit of Grauer.

narrative_arcs.title: Chief's Death and Native Homage to Marine
Explanation of Chief's Betrayal and Liberation
Post-Conflict Dialogue and Pursuit of Grauer

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma, Son's Rebellion, and Dolan's Discipline
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Devil Dog Dolan storyline with the Captain's dilemma, his son Sam's rebellion, Sam's fight, and Dolan's disciplinary action.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Banker Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins, Dan and Diane, and their investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, leading them through clues, suspects, and a community effort to save a sick child.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction of Twinkle Twins and News Assignment
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Twinkle Twins and their initial assignment to investigate the banker murder case.

narrative_arcs.title: The News Assignment and Initial Clues

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Investigation and Barnacci Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dan and Diane's visit to the hospital to investigate Tom Reilly and their developing suspicion of Barnacci's involvement.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Investigation and Miss Reilly's Condition

sub_scenes.title: Phone Call to Elijah and Startling News
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Dan calling Elijah for information and the startling newspaper news that directs them to find Tom Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store

sub_scenes.title: Search for Reilly and Mrs. Murphy's Information
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dan and Diane searching for Tom Reilly in the Irish section and encountering Mrs. Murphy who provides crucial information.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Tom Reilly in the Irish Section
Farnacci's Blood Transfusion and Mob Threat

sub_scenes.title: Reilly's Escape and Car Chase
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Reilly's escape attempt, the ensuing car chase, and the community roadblock.

sub_scenes.title: Street Brawl and Police Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows a separate street brawl and its resolution with police intervention, running parallel to the main chase.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath of Chase and Medical Emergency
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details the police apprehending the chase vehicles and the urgent medical transport of a shooting victim, shifting focus to the consequences of the conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Blood Transfusion and Community Support
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the medical crisis, the need for a blood transfusion for Mrs. Murphy, the community response, and Tom Reilly's eventual recovery thanks to the blood donation.

narrative_arcs.title: Diagnosis: Blood Transfusion Needed for Mrs. Murphy
Seeking Blood Donors and Initial Mismatch
Urgent Call for Blood Donors for Tom Reilly
Community Response and Arrival of Blood Donors
Blood Type Verification and Donation Process
Blood Transfusion and Tom Reilly's Recovery
Anticipation of Tom Reilly Revealing Information

sub_scenes.title: Justice for Banker and Birthday Celebration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Twinkle Twins storyline with the demand for justice against Farnacci, the police raid and arrests, and a celebratory birthday party for Reilly's daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Demand for Justice and Plan to Capture Farnacci
Police Pursuit and Raid to Arrest Farnacci
Confrontation and Apprehension at the Poolroom
Celebratory Birthday Party for Reilly's Daughter
